囷字的基本解释

囷
qūn
古代一种圆形谷仓：“（大荒）而囷鹿（方形仓）空虚。”
样子像囷仓的事物：“……少宝之山，百草木成囷。”
积聚；聚拢。

囷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qūn］
［《廣韻》去倫切，平真，清。］
(1)圆形谷仓。
(2)用以指类囷仓形之物。
(3)捆束；聚拢。
(4)回旋，围绕。参见“囷囷”、“囷輪”。

囷字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【囗字部】　囷； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页217第32
【唐韻】去倫切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】區倫切，?音箘。【說文】廩之圓者。从禾，在囗中。圓謂之囷，方謂之京。【周禮·冬官考工記·匠人】囷窌倉城。【註】地上爲之，圓曰囷，方曰倉，穿地曰窌。【詩·魏風】不稼不穡，胡取禾三百囷兮。【註】圓廩也。又【周語】市無赤米，而囷鹿空虛。【註】先儒以爲圓曰囷，方曰鹿。鹿善聚，亦善散，故囷亦謂之鹿也。　又輪囷，屈曲盤戾貌。【前漢·鄒陽傳】蟠木根柢，輪囷離奇，爲萬乗器，以左右爲之先也。【左思·吳都賦】重葩掩葉，輪囷虬蟠。【註】謂木如龍之盤屈也。　又星名。【石氏星經】天囷十二星，主倉廩之屬。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?巨隕切，音窘。義同。

囷字的起名意思

一种圆形谷仓。

granary
Basic explanation of words
granary
qūn
An ancient round barn: "(The Great Wilderness) and the deer (square barn) are empty."
Things that look like a storehouse: "...The mountain of Shaobao, a hundred plants and trees form a storehouse."
Accumulate; gather together.
granary
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qūn］
["Guangyun" goes to Lunqie, plain and clear. ]
(1) Round barn.
(2) It is used to refer to things that resemble a warehouse.
(3) Bundle; gather together.
(4) Revolve and surround. See "囷囷", "囷囷".
granary
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [囗字部] 　囷; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 217 32
[Tang Yun] Go to Lunqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Qu Lunqi,? Yin Xiao. [Said the text] The round of Lin. Conghe, in the 囗. The circle is called 囷, and the square is called Beijing. 【Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji·Craftsman】囷窌Cangcheng. [Note] It is on the ground, the circle is called 囷, the square is called warehouse, and the ground is called 窌. 【Poetry·Wei Feng】If you don't crop or humiliate, you will take three hundred huddles. [Note] Yuanlin also. [Zhou Yu] There is no red rice in the city, and the deer is empty. [Note] First Confucian thought that the circle is called 囷, and the square is called deer. Deer is good at gathering, but also good at dispersing, so 囷 is also called deer.　Round up again, buckling and twisting appearance. [Previous Han·Zou Yang Biography] The roots of the flat tree, the bizarre wheels, are the universal device, and the left and right are the first. 【Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu】Heavy flowers cover the leaves, round and round flowers. [Note] It is also said that the wood is like a dragon.　Also star name. 【Shi's Star Classics】Twelve stars in Tiankuo, belonging to the main Cangling.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun]? Jumee cut, sound embarrassed. The same meaning.
